Back (from left) Jody Walters, Gary McKenzie, Johan Jacobs, Alex MacKay, Amelia Gibb and Aaron MacDougall. Middle: Bevan Brooking, Sarah Gibb, James McKenzie, Lucas Nicol and coach Jason King. Front: Gus MacDougall, Kees Beets, Liam Nicol, Malachi Whitley and Tanner Feisst. Absent: Mitchell Spriggs, Ella Kelso, Ivy Fenwick and John MacKay.
